alert.note: Alert for Baca (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued April 04 at 3:09PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY HEALTH ADVISORY FOR BLOWING DUST FROM 1100 AM TUESDAY UNTIL 600 PM TUESDAY... The Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment has issued the following... WHAT...Air Quality Health Advisory for Blowing Dust. WHERE...Baca County. Locations include, but are not limited to Springfield. WHEN...1100 AM Tuesday April 04 to 600 PM Tuesday April 04 IMPACTS...Air Quality Health Advisory for Blowing Dust Issued for Baca County Issued at 11:00 AM MDT, Tuesday, April 4, 2023 Issued by the Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment Affected Area: Baca County. Locations include, but are not limited to Springfield and Campo. br Advisory in Effect: 11:00 AM MDT, Tuesday, April 4, 2023 to 6:00 PM MDT, Tuesday, April 4, 2023. Public Health Recommendations: If significant blowing dust is present and reducing visibility to less than 10 miles across a wide area, People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children in the affected area should reduce prolonged or heavy indoor and outdoor exertion. Outlook: Strong and gusty winds will produce areas of blowing dust on Tuesday. The threat for blowing dust will gradually diminish by Tuesday evening. HEALTH INFORMATION...Public Health Recommendations: Increasing likelihood of respiratory symptoms in sensitive individuals, aggravation of heart or lung disease and premature mortality in people with cardiopulmonary disease and older adults. People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion.
